alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Inland Sarasota; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 6:48AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sumter, eastern Pasco, southeastern Hernando, Manatee, Hillsborough, western Polk, northwestern Charlotte and Sarasota Counties through 730 AM EST... At 647 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bushnell to near University to 13 miles southwest of Gulf Gate Estates. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Lakeland, North Port, Sarasota, Bradenton, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Zephyrhills, Palmetto, Dade City, Bushnell, Fish Hawk, Brandon, Lutz, St. Leo, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Zephyrhills South, East Lake-Orient Park and Southgate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
